promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Redefine creativity with efficiency when you take advantage of Corel Painter® 2020, and a massive brush bundle for professional artistic expression! Also included are MultiCam Capture XL to record and share your complete process, from your screen to yourself, and Pinnacle Studio 24 Ultimate for unparalleled high-quality video editing when you need it. Transform your computer into a creativity hub, and show off your artistic chops. Purchases will also support Room to Read!

As an added bonus, you can enter the Corel Painter art contest sponsored by Intel, MSI and Humble Bundle for a chance at over $30k USD in cash and prizes!
Contest runs from January 19 - February 19, 2021.
promotions.tile_name: Humble Software Bundle: Design Expression Powerhouse
promotions.short_marketing_blurb: Get Corel Painter® 2020 and enter for a chance to win cash and prizes!
